text: Waynesville is a town in and the county seat of Haywood County, North Carolina, United States. It is the largest town in Haywood County and the largest in western North Carolina west of Asheville. Waynesville. As of the 2020 census, Waynesville had a population of 10,140. ==References== Category:Towns in North Carolina Category:County seats in North Carolina
title: Waynesville, North Carolina
